## # Ejercicio 2
```{r, echo= TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
mpg%>% filter(year == 2008 , hwy>31)%>%
   group_by(year)%>%
   summarise(year_n = n() )
```

## Parte 2
``` {r, echo= TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
mpg%>% filter(cty == 9 | hwy>90)%>%
   group_by(cty)%>%
   summarise(cty_n = n() )
```

## Parte 3
``` {r, echo= TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
select(mpg, displ, hwy)
``` 

## Parte 4
``` {r, echo= TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
select(mpg, trans:hwy)
```

## Parte 5
``` {r, echo= TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
mutate(mpg, KmCada100L= (100*3.78541)/(hwy*1.60934))
